selected_quotes: Voronova et al.: Crystal structure of catena-poly[calcium-di-μ3-benzoato-κ6O,O′:O-μ2-(dime... #IUCr

citation.abstract: In the title complex, [Ca(C7H5O2)2(C2H6OS)] n , the Ca(2+) ion (site symmetry m..) is surrounded by eight O atoms, six from two bridging-chelating tridentate benzoate carboxyl groups and two from a bridging dimethyl sulfoxide mol-ecule (point group symmetry m..), giving an irregular coordination geometry [Ca-O bond length range = 2.345 (2)-2.524 (2) Å]. One-dimensional coordination complex chains extending parallel to c are generated in which the triply μ2-O-bridged Ca(2+) cations are separated by 3.6401 (5) Å. In the crystal, weak intra-chain C-H⋯π hydrogen bonds are present between the methyl H atoms of the dimethyl sulfoxide mol-ecules as donors and the aromatic rings as acceptors [C-H⋯Cg = 3.790 (4) Å].
citation.journal: Acta crystallographica. Section E, Crystallographic communications
citation.title: Crystal structure of catena-poly[calcium-di-3-benzoato-6O,O':O-2-(dimethyl sulfoxide)-2O:O]
